title: Instant Pot Potato Soup
directions: Set Instant Pot to Sauté function and melt butter. Add onion and cook until soft, 5 minutes, then add garlic and thyme and cook until fragrant, 1 minute more.
Add potatoes and broth and place lid on Instant Pot. Set to Manual, High and set time for 8 minutes. Once finished, turn valve to quick release.
In a small bowl whisk together 2 tablespoons milk and cornstarch to make a slurry.
Remove lid from Instant Pot and set to Sauté function again. Pour in slurry, remaining 1 cup milk, and heavy cream and let boil about 5 minute, stirring constantly.
Garnish with cheddar, bacon, and chives before serving.
ingredients: 6 large russet potatoes, peeled and diced
